testsuite.name: GamezoneControllerTest

testcase.name: if an Hero fights with a Monster and looses it must disappear from the Gamezone
when the gamezone has 1 hero and 1 monster the total count of heroes must be 1
when the gamezone has 1 hero and 1 monster the total number of characters on the map must be 2
after putting a MapCharacter on the map its position shouldn't be null
moving Character North from (0,0) position must update grid with Character at position (0,1)
moving Character East from (0,0) position must update grid with Character at position (1,0)
when moving character from Cell, the Cell he moved from should be null
if MapCharacter is at xCoordinate edge he cannot move East
when the monster wins the combat between a hero the hero health must be equals or less than 0
when the gamezone has 1 hero the total count of heroes must be 1
